text:
It should be possible for a module to patch the XML entity catalogue of the web
application. This is crucial for running the docu publication offline, since the
Forrest source files contain the DTD declaration.
creator: andreas@apache.org
andreas@apache.org
text:
Created attachment 21153
Patch for modules2build.xsl

The patch allows modules to patch the entities.xcat file. It also includes some
early draft code for the non-XML catalogue file, which isn't working yet.
